DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect regular aerobic exercise endothelial function pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Physical Exercise Endothelial Function Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Preeclampsia common maternal disease complicate 5 % 10 % pregnancy remain major cause maternal neonatal mortality , especially develop country . Cost-effective intervention aim prevent development preeclampsia urgently need . Ethiopathogenesis preeclampsia involve multiple mechanism oxidative stress , endothelial dysfunction , infection , maternal constitutional factor , others . Regular aerobic exercise recovers endothelial function , decrease oxidative stress improve maternal constitutional factor . The purpose Controlled Clinical Trial determine effect regular aerobic exercise endothelium-dependent brachial artery flow-mediated dilatation . Furthermore , effect exercise biomarkers vascular function perinatal outcomes evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Primiparous woman participate structured exercise program , include significant amount walk past four month eligible trial . Live foetus routine ultrasound scan normal pregnancy . Gestational age 16 20 week Written inform consent obtain woman prior inclusion study . History high blood pressure Chronic medical illness ( cancer , renal , endocrinologic , psychiatric , neurologic , infectious cardiovascular disease ) Persistent bleed week 12 gestation Poorly control thyroid disease Placenta praevia , incompetent cervix , polyhydramnios , oligohydramnios History miscarriage last twelve month Diseases could interfere participation ( follow recommendation ACSM 2000 , ACOG 2003 ) .
